Documentation.content: * The 'double' factorial is defined for ODD n and is the product of * all the odd numbers up to and including that number. * We are extending the meaning to even numbers to mean the product * of the even numbers up to and including that number. * Thus DoubleFac(8) = 8*6*4*2 * We also defend against i < 2 (returning 1.0) *@param i the value used in the calculation *@return the factorial of the sequence, declining by 2
